parameters.onstudy: date of enrollment into the clinical trial, in month/day/year format
parameters.stage: a factor with levels LA (locally advanced) or M (metastatic)
parameters.progression: date of progression, in month/day/year format
parameters.death: date of death, in month/day/year format

reference: Since all patients in this study have known death dates, there is no censoring.
title: pancreatic
description:
Description
Data from a Phase II clinical trial of patients with locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer.
format: A data frame with 41 observations on the following 4 variables.
